entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
